institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 14 (Establishment and Composition of Skill Competition Deliberation Committee)
contents: Article 14 (Establishment and Composition of the Skills Competition Deliberation Committee) ① The Skills Competition Deliberation Committee (hereinafter referred to as the *Deliberation Committee) shall be established in the Korean Committee and city/provincial committees to deliberate on important matters such as selection of technical committee members., ② The deliberation committee consists of one chairperson and four or more members. ③ The chairman shall be the chairman of the steering committee, and the ex officio members shall include the chairman of the technical committee, the secretary general, and the vice-chairman of technology, and shall be appointed by the chairman from among skill competition experts, such as division heads. Revised February 22, 2018, ④ The deliberation committee established and operated by the city/provincial committee has the city/provincial committee steering committee chairperson as the chairperson, and has the city/provincial technical committee chairperson and the city/provincial secretary general as ex officio members, and performs other functions. Among game experts, the person appointed by the city/provincial committee steering committee chairperson shall be appointed., ⑤ The term of office of the chairperson and ex officio members shall be the period of service, and separately appointed members shall be deemed dismissed at the end of the committee meeting., ⑥ Chairperson In the event of such an accident, the Secretary General shall act on his behalf, and the Deputy Secretary General shall become the Secretary for the affairs of the Committee.
